recipesJson.name: melon madness
recipesJson.author: Djbrandnew
recipesJson.description: refreshing vape that I enjoy during the summer on a hot day.

reviews.text: I thought this was going to be way too heavy on the honeydew, but it works nicely.  I had to mix without the sour, so I'm not getting the real deal Holyfield on it, but it's probably going to work with me a few days a week throughout this summer.  Nicely done.
